title: Pset_FanPHistory
description:
Fan performance history attributes.
Sound attribute deleted in IFC2x2 Pset Addendum: Use IfcSoundProperties instead.

WheelTipSpeed.title: WheelTipSpeed
WheelTipSpeed.description: Fan blade tip speed, typically defined as the linear speed of the tip of the fan blade furthest from the shaft.

OverallEfficiency.title: OverallEfficiency
OverallEfficiency.description: Total efficiency of motor and fan.

DischargeVelocity.title: DischargeVelocity
DischargeVelocity.description: The speed at which air discharges from the fan through the fan housing discharge opening.

DischargePressureLoss.title: DischargePressureLoss
DischargePressureLoss.description: Fan discharge pressure loss associated with the discharge arrangement.

DrivePowerLoss.title: DrivePowerLoss
DrivePowerLoss.description: Fan drive power losses associated with the type of connection between the motor and the fan wheel.
